Sentencas: A one-dimensional button-cell model is developed and applied to explore the influence of anode microstructure on solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) performance.
Titulo: Importance of anode microstructure in modeling solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The model couples porous-media gas transport and elementary electrochemical kinetics within a porous Ni-yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) cermet anode, a dense YSZ electrolyte membrane, and a composite lanthanum strontium manganite (LSM)-YSZ cathode.
Titulo: Importance of anode microstructure in modeling solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In all cases the fuel is humidified H-2 and air is the oxidizer.
Titulo: Importance of anode microstructure in modeling solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The effects of porosity, tortuosity, and other microstructural geometric factors are evaluated with respect to their overpotential contributions.
Titulo: Importance of anode microstructure in modeling solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The model is used to assist interpretation of the experimental results reported by Zhao and Virkar
Titulo: Importance of anode microstructure in modeling solid oxide fuel cells
Importance of anode microstructure in modeling solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The model results indicate that a correct formulation of concentration-gradients' dependence on tortuosity in porous electrodes provides a means for fitting the experimental data with reasonable support-layer tortuosity values (< 5.0).
Titulo: Importance of anode microstructure in modeling solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Further, the fitting results indicate that there must be a physically reasonable negative correlation between support-layer porosity and tortuosity.
Titulo: Importance of anode microstructure in modeling solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results also show that reducing anode porosity, which increases mass-transfer resistance, can significantly increase the thickness of the electrochemically active region.
Titulo: Importance of anode microstructure in modeling solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These results indicate the importance of incorporating detailed chemistry and distributed reaction zones to evaluate the design and performance of SOFC membrane electrode assemblies.
Titulo: Importance of anode microstructure in modeling solid oxide fuel cells
